member.name: M:CalendarTools.WeekdayTools.GetWeekDayFormattedForLanguage(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a formatted dictionary of weekdays for each day within the given year and month. The names will be formatted dependent on the given language.
member.param: The format of the day, full format or short
The language in which the weekdays should be returned.
member.returns: A dictionary with all days within the given month, that are including the named weekdays in the given language.
